item.title: Notes: Clark - 2014 - Quantitative research designs: recognizing the overall plan for a study
item.description: References Citekey: @Clark2014-nn Clark, V. L. P., & Creswell, J. W. (2014). Understanding research: A consumerâ€™s guide. Pearson Higher Ed. (Chapter 6) Notes Highlights This chapter first introduces you to two major types of quantitative research. It then focuses on the characteristics of five quantitative research designs that you will likely encounter as you read research. Knowing about different quantitative research designs will help you read the Method sections of quantitative reports and understand and evaluate the research designs used in quantitative studies.
